document.full_text: peter thiel, a prominent silicon valley investor, says we are not being carried away in a second tech bubble. the doomsayers are simply hungover from the last bubble's burst, he said.
document.title: thiel: tech bubble? what tech bubble?
lines_and_colors: peter thiel, a prominent silicon valley investor, says we are not being carried away in a second tech bubble. the doomsayers are simply hungover from the last bubble's burst, he said.
